metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9687 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
PoDoFo 0.9.6 has a heap-based buffer overflow in PdfString::ConvertUTF16toUTF8 in base/PdfString.cpp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-9687` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpodofo-utils - 0.9.6+dfsg-5
libpodofo0.9.7 - 0.9.6+dfsg-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.6+dfsg-5').
